channel.title: How to disable sdwdate-gui synchronization in Qubes-Whonix?
channel.description:
There is a functionality in Qubes-Whonix which seems to notify sys-whonix's sdwdate-gui of completed time fetching in Whonix-Workstation qubes. I had two issues with Qubes-Whonix which I have reason to believe were caused by this functionality or something related to it. * [CPU usage fluctuations while Whonix-Workstation is running](http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/cpu-usage-fluctuations-while-whonix-workstation-is-running/) * [Impossible to shut down Workstation qubes after the latest update](http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/impossible-to-shut-down-workstation-qubes-after-the-latest-update/)
Is there a way to disable it? This is a general support question, I want to do this so I can confirm these bugs were actually caused by the functionality. The other topics are the bug reports.

item.title: How to disable sdwdate-gui synchronization in Qubes-Whonix?
item.dc:creator: singularity
item.description:
I did not realize it depends on Workstation’s sdwdate-gui. Thank you for the clarification.

Read full topic
item.source: How to disable sdwdate-gui synchronization in Qubes-Whonix?

item.title: How to disable sdwdate-gui synchronization in Qubes-Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
singularity:

Is there a way to disable it?

Easily found on web serach. Search term:

sdwdate-gui disable

Whonix – 15 Nov 20

Please use Search Engines and see Documentation First

Please do not ask very basic questions because it will not work that way.

See:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Sdwdate-gui#Disable_Autostart

Read full topic
item.source: How to disable sdwdate-gui synchronization in Qubes-Whonix?

item.title: How to disable sdwdate-gui synchronization in Qubes-Whonix?
item.dc:creator: singularity
item.description:
There is a functionality in Qubes-Whonix which seems to notify sys-whonix’s sdwdate-gui of completed time fetching in Whonix-Workstation qubes.
I had two issues with Qubes-Whonix which I have reason to believe were caused by this functionality or something related to it.

  • CPU usage fluctuations while Whonix-Workstation is running
  • Impossible to shut down Workstation qubes after the latest update

Is there a way to disable it?
This is a general support question, I want to do this so I can confirm these bugs were actually caused by the functionality. The other topics are the bug reports.

Read full topic
item.source: How to disable sdwdate-gui synchronization in Qubes-Whonix?
